description:
An intuitive video editor for every skill level.

Filmora is an intuitive video editor for every skill level. Filmora makes it easy for anyone to be creative. Jump into an editing experience where advanced features are simple and fun. We got rid of repetitive tasks so you can devote your energy to your imagination. Get inspired by Filmora, an editor designed for creators like you.
1. Marketing Data Analysis
- You can schedule video posts to Facebook, Instagram, and other platforms, view data such as views and likes, and learn short video creation techniques.
2. Drawing Tools Update
- Line Toolï¼šNow, you can draw straight lines directly on the player, making it easy to add precise elements to your video edits.
3. New Audio Stickers Resource Icon
- New audio + sticker combination resources have been added to the resource section, where the sticker content will automatically match the corresponding sound effects.
4. New Templates for Image-to-Video
- Three new templates are now available, including the "Christmas Hug" featuring Identity V characters.
5. TTS Voices Update:
- New additions include fun IP-simulated voices like P.Star and Morti.
